bwwExcerpt: Now that David Cromer's 'Our Town' has closed, 'A Life in the Theatre' is the New York show to see. I wish that Mr. Stewart had a stronger partner opposite him, but his performance is rich enough to carry the play all by itself.

keyPhrases.quote: Now that David Cromer's 'Our Town' has closed, 'A Life in the Theatre' is the New York show to see.
